description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory usage as well as individual deployment services statistics.

panels.description: Cluster CPU Utilization Based On Total CPU Available in Cluster (on 1m Average)
panels.title: Cluster CPU Utilization

panels.description: Cluster Memory Utilization Based on total memory available in Cluster
panels.title: Cluster Memory Utilization

panels.description: Cluster CPU request per node

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum (machine_cpu_cores) * 100

panels.title: Cluster CPU Requested/Reserved/Hold

panels.description: Cluster Memory requested per node

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum (machine_memory_bytes) * 100

panels.title: Cluster Memory Reserved/Requested/Hold

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1))
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1))

panels.title: Overall Cluster CPU & RAM Statistics - all

panels.description: This is calculated on basis of Node Allocatable CPU
panels.title: Total - PODS CPU Utilization (based on CPU Available for PODS in Cluster)

panels.description: This is calculated on basis of Node Allocatable Memory
panels.title: Total - PODS Memory Utilization (based on Memory Available for PODS in Cluster)
Overall Cluster System services CPU statistics - all
Overall Cluster System services memory statistics - all

panels.description: Current CPU usage on Worker Node $Node
panels.title: Current CPU Utilization (1m avg)

panels.description: Current Memory Usage on Worker Node $Node
panels.title: Current Memory Utilization

panels.description: Total CPU Requested (including all pods)  on worker node $Node

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"^$Node$"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum (kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{node=~"^$Node$"}) * 100

panels.title: CPU Requested (1m avg)

panels.description: Memory requested on worker node $Node

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"^$Node$"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum (kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{node=~"^$Node$"}) * 100

panels.title: Memory Requested

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"^$Node$"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1))
sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"^$Node$"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (pod) group_left()  (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1))

panels.description: Describes the CPU utilization of deployment
panels.title: CPU usage - Deployment

panels.description: Describes the CPU requested by deployment.
panels.title: CPU Requested By Deployments

panels.description: Describes the memory utilization of deployments in cluster
panels.title: Memory Utilization of  Deployments

panels.description: Describes the reserve memory requested by deployments in cluster
panels.title: Memory Requested By Deployments

panels.description: Describes the available replicas for requested deployment

targets.expr: (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: Available replicas - Deployment

panels.description: Describes the total number of replica for requested deployment

targets.expr: (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset",namespace="$deployment_namespace"}) or vector(0))

panels.title: Total replicas - Deployment
